text: Unmasked may refer to: * Unmasked (Kiss album), 1980 ** Unmasked Tour, a 1980 concert tour by the hard rock group Kiss * Unmasked (Ira Losco album) * Unmasked (EP), a 2007 EP by Cauterize * Unmasked (radio show), an American radio show * Unmasked (Left Behind: The Kids), a book written by Jerry B. Jenkins and Tim LaHaye * "Unmasked" (The Following), an episode of the TV series The Following * Unmasked (1917 film), a 1917 film added to the United States National Film Registry in 2014 * Unmasked (1950 film), a 1950 American crime film * "Unmasked" (Arrow), an episode of the television series Arrow * "UnmAsked" (Pretty Little Liars), a 2012 episode of the television series Pretty Little Liars * Unmasked: Two Confidential Interviews with Hitler in 1931 ==See also== *Unmasking by intelligence agencies
title: Unmasked
